title: On a determinant involving linear combinations of Legendre symbols
authors: Keqin Liu, Zhi-Wei Sun and Li-Yuan Wang
abstract:
In this paper, we study a conjecture of the second author on determinants
involving Legendre symbols. For example, we prove that
$$\det\left[x+\left(\frac{i-j}p\right)+\left(\frac ip\right)y+\left(\frac
jp\right)z+\left(\frac{ij}p\right)w\right]_{0\le i,j\le(p-3)/2}=x$$ for any
prime $p\equiv3\pmod4$, where $(\frac{\cdot}p)$ denotes the Legendre symbol.
